title: Notifications List (request)
description: Retrieve the list of notifications for the user.

size.description: The number of messages to show beginning from the 'starts_from' position

starts_from.description: The initial notification to begin with (0 for first)

subscribe.description: [Optional] If set to 1, will send updates whenever new notications are received.

loginid.description: [Optional] The login id of the user. If left unspecified, it defaults to the initial authorized token's login id.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
